name: 4.08.01 - Embankment Walls and Foundations Mix Design

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - The Contractor shall submit a concrete mix design certified by an independent testing laboratory no later than four weeks prior to the commencement of concrete placement to the Engineer for Approval.
Frequency - Four weeks prior to the commencement of concrete

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Compression testing shall be carried out at the cost of the Contractor by an independent laboratory to which the Engineer has no objection.
